channel.title: Compass
channel.description:
I repositioned my compass to fit the 503 frame, although part of the compass is hidden through the left side of the Mapback. Not sure If I have to make the mapback one whole sprite, or what.
[img]http://img247.imageshack.us/img247/8329/compassbs3.png[/img]
Thanks.

item.title: Compass
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Oh, I just tried doing something like that on my 317 client, and it didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compass
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:5, topic:243612”][quote author=wmashda3000 link=topic=319912.msg2534499#msg2534499 date=1226674230]
Try just making the compass sprite bigger on one side, and move the picture to the other.
[/quote]

You can’t because the sprites have regions in which they can’t pass.
They can only be so big, so you have to divide it in sections.

^ Which is stupid right?[/quote]

You can make your whole mapback into one sprite instead of three, although I’m not the greatest at clients. Also, your idea would work, but also that half of the compass wouldn’t match the other side as it rotates around.

Read full topic

item.title: Compass
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Just create the other half of the compass on the sprite that is to the left of it.
Simple fix, take a screeny of the compass from another client, and just C+P the other half.

Read full topic
